amendment.description: To modify the authorities on micro nuclear reactor programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2331 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2331 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Shelby to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4195) To modify the authorities on micro nuclear reactor programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2331 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
